title: Prácticas pornográficas frente a la pulsión de muerte, Santiago de Chile (2019–2022)
desc: The spectrum of grief is wide, and the journeys of libido are unpredictable. This video-essay explores porn censorship in Chile through a BDSM session, examining cases from the social uprising and the pandemic, highlighting the creation of porn platforms as spaces of resistance and pornography as the scapegoat of institutional violence.
